articles.author: Barnini Chakraborty
articles.title: California officials warn of Carmageddon 2.0, tell residents to steer clear of highway
articles.description: California highway officials warn hoping for a repeat performance at the end of April as Carmageddon 2.0 threatens once more to rear its ugly head.
articles.content: For most Angelenos, they remember where they were on the harrowing weekend eight years ago when Interstate 405 was shut down in both directions. They had been bracing for it for months, ready for the nightmarish hellscape that would undoubtedly unfold before … [+3725 chars]
